block_comment: This line of code checks for a specific condition in a digital logic circuit. Specifically, it determines if the value of the latched random number 'RandomLatched' equals to hexadecimal zero. It does this by using an assignment in Verilog ('assign'), which continuously drives the output 'RandomEq0' based on the condition whether 'RandomLatched' equals zero. This operation is done in real time, meaning that any changes in 'RandomLatched' will immediately reflect on the 'RandomEq0' value.
